nodes.text: Automata Galactica was a droid manufacturing company that combined with Industrial Intelligence to form Industrial Automaton, one of the two most popular droid-producing companies.
Automata Galactica developed the ET-74 communications droid prior to the Mandalorian Wars.
On a specific day during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, all employees were forced to change their pass codes for the AG-network
